title: BakaXL - A new way to launch your Minecraft
Footer_Mobile: You are now using Smart Device to visit BakaXL website, some feature will disable.
News_1_Desc: Welcome to the BakaXL offical website!
News_2_Desc: The new version of BakaXL(2.2.7) is now available! Try it now!
News_3_Desc: BakaTinge System can let BakaXL control your gaming RGB system such as Razer Keyboard, Mouse or Logitech Mouse..
Protocol_Content_Unavaliable:
BakaXL Protocol is currently unavailable now, the reason may be

1. This resource is unavailable in BakaPlaza
2. BakaXL Protocol has been disabled
Protocol_Content:
BakaXL will open and handle your request.

BakaXL will automatically open if you enable 'BakaXL Protocol' feature.
If 'BakaXL Protocol' is disabled, you need to open BakaXL manually.
